sn35.54:1.1: “Kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, jānato, kathaṁ passato, saṁyojanā pahīyantī”ti?
sn35.54:1.2: “Cakkhuṁ kho, bhikkhu, aniccato jānato passato saṁyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.6: yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato saṁyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.15: yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato saṁyojanā pahīyanti.
sn35.54:1.16: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṁ passato saṁyojanā pahīyantī”ti.
